data.title: Bob Bender, Author at Canyon AeroConnect
data.text:
Prescott, AZ – Canyon AeroConnect today announced their participation in the 8th Annual Army Aviation Industry Days at Fort Rucker Alabama, July 20-22 Among the feature products will be the Canyon Flexcomm™ RT-7000 Airborne Tactical Radio as a flexible software defined radio solution that facilitates enhanced mission interoperability.

Visit Canyon AeroConnect at the show. You can also schedule a Meeting with Us using the form below.

Canyon to participate in the APSCON 2021 Conference & Exposition – July 26-31 in New Orleans, LA

Prescott, AZ – Canyon AeroConnect today announced their participation in the APSCON 2021 Conference & Exposition – July 26-31 in New Orleans, LA. Among the feature products will be the Canyon Flexcomm™ RT-7000 Airborne Tactical Radio, which is the only panel-mount radio that satisfies all public safety and para-public voice communication needs and the TITAN and DACS Digital Audio products.

Visit Canyon AeroConnect at Booth #940 or Schedule a Meeting with Us using the form below.

Prescott, AZ – Canyon AeroConnect today announced their participation in the 4th Annual AEA International Convention & Trade Show in Dallas, TX from June 22 to 25, 2021. Among the feature products will be the TITAN Digital Audio Management System that is the smallest and lightest audio solution for light helicopters and fixed wing aircraft available today. “TITAN is a high-functional-density communications management system designed to control and manage all aircraft audio, presented in an amazingly light and compact form factor. Our family of products are based on

the same core technology, a state-of-the art Digital Signal Processor (DSP), mixing and filtering all audio sources in the digital domain to deliver crystal clear audio.” says Jim Jackalone, Director Marketing at Canyon AeroConnect .

Customers will be able to learn more about the Canyon Digital Audio Control System (DACS), which is a communications management system with the ability to control and distribute all audio in an aircraft, to/from all transceivers, receivers, and aural alert sources. The Canyon Flexcomm™ RT-7000 Tactical Radio, which is the only panel-mount radio that satisfies all public safety and para-public voice communication needs will also be featured.

Visit Canyon AeroConnect at Booth 822 or Schedule a Meeting with Us using the form below.

Prescott, AZ – Canyon AeroConnect today announced the launch of its new website at www.canyonaeroconnect.com. The new website offers customers, engineers, employees and specifiers a multitude of information about Canyon AeroConnect’s products, capabilities, and support solutions. Canyon is the world’s leading supplier of avionic-standard aircraft radio and systems. We specialize in aircraft communication equipment for Air Ambulance, Law Enforcement, SAR, EMS, Electronic News Gathering, Military and Marine applications. Products include digital and analog radio/audio management systems, Tac/ComT FM radio systems, intercoms, PA & loudhailers, data interface accessories, and aural warning generators.

“Our customers will be able to find detailed information about our products and access technical documents that help them operate mission-critical equipment. Our users will find support opportunities with downloadable datasheets, training modules, technical document, troubleshooting and application notes. Job applicants can also explore our open positions and apply for positions right on our website. We are excited about our new website and the new capabilities it brings to our customers.” said Vince Ciolli, President of Canyon AeroConnect.

Please visit us at our new digital home at www.canyonaeroconnect.com

About Canyon AeroConnect-

Canyon AeroConnect is the global leader in avionic-standard aircraft radio and systems for aircraft communication equipment for Air Ambulance, Law Enforcement, SAR, EMS, Electronic News Gathering, Military and Marine applications. Products include digital and analog radio/audio management systems, Tac/ComT FM radio systems, intercoms, PA & loudhailers, data interface accessories, and aural warning generators. Headquartered in Prescott, AZ with 50 years of experience, Canyon’s engineered, high-performance products can be found on aircraft worldwide. For more information please visit our website at www.canyonaeroconnect.com.

Prescott, AZ –. As a result of the acquisition of the Cobham Aerospace business by Transdigm Group in January 2021 we are excited to announce today the new brand and corporate identity of our business as Canyon AeroConnect. “We are now an independent company delivering the same performance, reliability and service that customers have come to expect from us. We are the global leader in aircraft communication equipment for Air Ambulance, Law Enforcement, SAR, EMS, Electronic News Gathering, Military and Marine applications. Customers worldwide can continue to count on us wherever their missions take them in the future. ” says Vince Ciolli, President of Canyon AeroConnect.

The new brand identity and logo reflects our long-standing commitment to our customers, employees and the central Arizona region. The unique color scheme and icon reflects our uniqueness as a solutions-provider in the aerospace industry and the unique nature of every customers mission. We will also deploy the trademarked tagline “Every Mission Matters” to help us communicate our unique commitment to our customers. The rebranding initiative coincides with investments in the company’s infrastructure, processes and capabilities.

Our first infrastructure investment, a new website also launched today at www.canyonaeroconnect.com. “Our customers will be able to find detailed information about our products and access technical documents that help them operate mission-critical equipment. Our users will find support opportunities with downloadable datasheets, training modules, technical document, troubleshooting and application notes. Job applicants can also explore our open positions and apply for positions right on our website.”, adds Ciolli

We look forward to bringing continued innovation in terms of new products and service offerings in the near future.

About Canyon AeroConnect-

Canyon AeroConnect is the global leader in avionic-standard aircraft radio and systems for aircraft communication equipment for Air Ambulance, Law Enforcement, SAR, EMS, Electronic News Gathering, Military and Marine applications. Products include digital and analog radio/audio management systems, Tac/ComT FM radio systems, intercoms, PA & loudhailers, data interface accessories, and aural warning generators. Headquartered in Prescott, AZ with 50 years of experience, Canyon’s engineered, high-performance products can be found on aircraft worldwide. For more information please visit our website at www.canyonaeroconnect.com.
